title: Pillow Talk
description: THE LIBRA MAN The Libra man is handsome, kind and considerate -- and a stickler for honesty. His woman had better not deceive him... ONE LIBRA MAN IN PARTICULAR Dream researcher Jared Dalton thought he'd found the perfect subject in fellow psychologist and grant competitor Kendall Arden. She was bright, beautiful and could vividly describe her dreams. But there were moments when Jared felt Kendall wasn't quite revealing the whole truth. Her crystal-clear images would often get murky -- just when things started to get interesting! STAR-CROSSED LOVERS...OR A MATCH MADE IN HEAVEN? Egads! Kendall couldn't tell Jared that he was playing a starring role in her fantasies. How would the good doctor react if he discovered that his daytime colleague was secretly a nighttime temptress...for him!
author: Patricia Ellis
